articles.title: Apple sued over abandoning CSAM detection for iCloud - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple is being sued over its decision not to implement a system that would have scanned iCloud photos for child sexual abuse material (CSAM). The lawsuit
articles.content:
Apple is being sued over its decision not to implement a system that would have scanned iCloud photos for child sexual abuse material (CSAM).
